mapper.insert: insert into sys_consumer( consumer_id, name, sex, tel, province, addr, repeat_purchase_rate, is_return, is_friend, is_black, remark, create_user, create_time )values( #{consumerId}, #{name}, ${sex}, #{tel}, #{province}, #{addr}, ${repeatPurchaseRate}, ${isReturn}, ${isFriend}, ${isBlack}, #{remark}, #{createUser}, sysdate )
mapper.select:
select tb.*, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.create_user) as create_by_transformation, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.update_user) as update_by_transformation from sys_consumer tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.name}),'%') or tb.province like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.name}),'%') )
order by tb.create_time desc

select count(1) as totalCount from sys_consumer tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.name}),'%') or tb.province like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.name}),'%') )
order by tb.create_time DESC
mapper.update: update sys_consumer a set a.name = #{name}, a.sex = ${sex}, a.tel = #{tel}, a.province = #{province}, a.addr = #{addr}, a.repeat_purchase_rate = ${repeatPurchaseRate}, a.is_return=${isReturn}, a.is_friend=${isFriend}, a.is_black = ${isBlack}, a.remark = #{remark}, a.update_user = #{updateUser}, a.update_time = sysdate where a.consumer_id = #{consumerId}
